fr.dc.clients.services.dao

Interface ClientDAOInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientDAOImpl

    public interface ClientDAOInterface
    This is an interface of the Data Access Object which links the main class to the Data Access Object classes used to represent the Identity

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(Client client)
      This method is used to save a client to the database
      void delete(int id)
      This method deletes a client with the matching id from the database
      java.util.List<Client> getAll()
      This method is used to get all clients from the database
      Client getById(int id)
      This method is used to get a client with matching id from the database
      void update(Client client)
      This method searches for a client from the database whose id matches the user input and updates it in the database

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        java.util.List<Client> getAll()
        This method is used to get all clients from the database
        Returns:
        clientList The list containing the clients read from the database

      • getById

        Client getById(int id)
        This method is used to get a client with matching id from the database
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the client to be read from the database
        Returns:
        client The client with the matching id from the database

      • create

        void create(Client client)
        This method is used to save a client to the database
        Parameters:
        client - The client to be saved to the database

      • update

        void update(Client client)
        This method searches for a client from the database whose id matches the user input and updates it in the database
        Parameters:
        client - The client to be updated in the database

      • delete

        void delete(int id)
        This method deletes a client with the matching id from the database
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the client to be deleted from the database
